product_name: Mountain Hardwear DrySpun Burnout Hoodie - Women
long_description: The DrySpun Burnout Hoodie for women from Mountain Hardware features a fading stripes effect on the hood, back and shoulders and might be just what you grab to watch the sunset outdoors. Lightweight and cozy polyester/elastane blend feels like cotton; fabric wicks away moisture, dries quick and features an antimicrobial finish that controls odor. Flat-lock seam construction eliminates chafing.
short_description: The DrySpun Burnout Hoodie for women from Mountain Hardware features a fading stripes effect on the hood, back and shoulders and might be just what you grab to watch the sunset outdoors.
